definition: to block sb's path/to obstruct/to flag down (a taxi)
"hand" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 64), occurring in 提, 把, 打 etc
surname Lan/abbr. for Lanzhou 蘭州|兰州[Lan2 zhou1], Gansu
orchid (蘭花|兰花 Cymbidium goeringii)/fragrant thoroughwort (蘭草|兰草 Eupatorium fortunei)/lily magnolia (木蘭|木兰)
to intercept at the net (volleyball, tennis etc)/to block
(hitting) squarely in the middle/(slicing) across the middle/to hold by the waist
to blab/to shoot one's mouth off/to commit a gaffe
(of police etc) to stop (sb) for inspection/to pull (sb) over

sentences.english: Foreign reporters weren't permitted inside a fence around the courthouse in western Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 外国记者被拦在位于沪西的法院栅栏外。

sentences.english: Reporters were barred from the courtroom.
sentences.chinese: 记者们被拦在法庭门外。

sentences.english: The summer rather lifts a leg to just walk, the woman shamelesses of block to come up.
sentences.chinese: 夏宁抬腿才走，女人就不要脸的拦上来。

sentences.english: Attack from orange team is blocked by blue team back to orange side.
sentences.chinese: 从橘队的攻击被蓝队拦回到橘队这边。

sentences.english: With the outskirts of Gilgit in sight, we were stopped by a policeman.
sentences.chinese: 吉尔吉特郊区在望了，我们被警察拦了下来。

sentences.english: Only ticket-holders were given admission and all others were roped out.
sentences.chinese: 只有持票者才准入内，其他人员一律被拦在绳子外面。

sentences.english: Which is how I got pulled over by a highway patrolman.
sentences.chinese: 有一次我就因为超速度行驶被一个公路巡警拦了下来。

sentences.english: He jumped and blocked the spike.
Is mainly reflected in the defense invalid block the ball on the defensive effect of differences.
sentences.chinese: 主要体现在防守无效拦网球的防守效果差异上。

sentences.english: I want to see the seven-o'clock news report.
sentences.chinese: 我想拦七点钟的新闻联播。

sentences.english: The soldiers at the border halted the travelers to check their passports.
sentences.chinese: 驻守边界的士兵把游客拦下来，检查他们的护照。

sentences.english: Jack smashed to the road and took a taxi to hospital.
sentences.chinese: 安杰冲上马路，拦了一辆车。

sentences.english: He d finally managed to stop the train. He d flagged down a car and gotten a ride back.
sentences.chinese: 他最终还是设法停下了火车，然后拦了辆车返回来。

sentences.english: Sad reversed, and will be stopped in the door, happiness has been into do not come.
sentences.chinese: 悲伤逆转，将幸福拦在了门外，一直进不来。

sentences.english: Purple Qiao and secretly leap out of the Xiao stop extra at their front.
sentences.chinese: 紫俏和暗地蹦出来的阿晓更是拦在了她们前边。

sentences.english: On the basis of which the general formula for controlling soil erosion by vegetation is established.
sentences.chinese: 根据一般方程推导了植被覆盖度与拦沙量的诸关系式。

definition: to resist/to obstruct/to hinder/to keep off/to block (a blow)/to get in the way of/cover/gear (e.g. in a car's transmission)
to expel/to oust/(dialect) to chase after/to try to catch up with
to provide support/to come to the rescue
to overtake/to catch up with/to hurry/to rush/to try to catch (the bus etc)/to drive (cattle etc) forward/to drive (sb) away/to avail oneself of (an opportunity)/until
to get out of the way
